tagline: Builds browser extensions that are powerful, minimal, and respectful of the user's trust
pros: Deep Manifest V3 and WebExtension expertise across Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
Permission-first design that maximizes Web Store approval rates
Performance-conscious — extensions that don't slow down the browser
cons: Narrow platform scope — extensions only, not full web applications
Browser API churn means ongoing maintenance as platforms evolve
Limited by what browser extension APIs expose — some features are simply impossible

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
